Terminion is perplexed by Skulletron's words.

Terminion: It makes me wonde=
r. Why does such a big talented guy like you have to be our enemy? It doesn=
't make sense. It would make more sense for us to be allies, and to be up a=
gainst all of the insolent who try to ignore perfectly good characters like=
 ourselves...

  ----- Original Message -----
  From: LurkerAbyss
  To: nbw=
rpg@yahoogroups.com
  Sent: Sunday, August 04, 2002 4:02 AM
  Subject: Re: =
Character Debut/Return...


        Skulletron:  Yes, I do.

        He spi=
ts.

        Skulletron:  Unless you think you have a chance of surviving o=
ut here.  I know where I'm going.  And I'd hope you know where you are goin=
g here, because the desert is seemingly endless, unless you get to be my ag=
e...

        -------Original Message-------

        From: nbwrpg@yahoogro=
ups.com
        Date: August 04, 2002 04:01:02 AM
        To: nbwrpg@yahoog=
roups.com
        Subject: Re: Character Debut/Return...

        Terminion=
 stops. This time the other 4 stop behind him. Terminion draws a rifle. Mon=
ster does so as well. The other 3 draw pistols.

        Terminion: Do you =
really believe we'd follow you after a comment like that?...

          ---=
-- Original Message -----
          From: LurkerAbyss
          To: nbwrpg@=
yahoogroups.com
          Sent: Sunday, August 04, 2002 2:56 AM
          S=
ubject: Re: Character Debut/Return...


                Skulletron stopped =
angrily, and turned around to face them.

                Skulletron:  Look=
, if it weren't for this damned organic side of me, I wouldn't have to eat =
you guys to stay in perfect condition, but I do.  So shut up or go to the p=
it!

                He points his gun at Terminion.

                Skull=
etron:  I'm having second thoughts on who I will eat first.

              =
  He turned around, and continued his long walk...

                -------=
Original Message-------

                From: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
     =
           Date: August 04, 2002 03:23:59 AM
                To: nbwrpg@yah=
oogroups.com
                Subject: Re: Character Debut/Return...

      =
          Terminion stopped and the other 4 start pushing him forward.

   =
             Terminion: Hold the internet connection, here, what's this abo=
ut eating people? It sounds kind of like you're crazy.

                Jun=
k Man: There is nothing wrong with being crazy! Don't listen to him, he's s=
o rude.

                Terminion: I'M rude? You wrecked my ship!

       =
         Junk Man: Shut up...

                  ----- Original Message ---=
-- 
                  From: LurkerAbyss 
                  To: nbwrpg@yahoo=
groups.com 
                  Sent: Sunday, August 04, 2002 2:45 AM
       =
           Subject: Re: Character Debut/Return...


                       =
 Skulletron:  Shut up.  Or else I'll eat you first!

                      =
  Skulletron sneared and kept on walking...

                        ------=
-Original Message-------

                        From: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.=
com
                        Date: August 04, 2002 02:57:02 AM
             =
           To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
                        Subject: Re: =
Character Debut/Return...

                        Mincer: Will this lead u=
s out of the desert?...

                          ----- Original Message -=
----
                          From: LurkerAbyss
                          =
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
                          Sent: Sunday, August 0=
4, 2002 1:59 AM
                          Subject: Re: Character Debut/Retu=
rn...


                                Skulletron glared at Terminion sini=
sterly, and  then looked forward and continued walking...

                =
                -------Original Message-------

                           =
     From: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
                                Date: Aug=
ust 04, 2002 02:17:30 AM
                                To: nbwrpg@yahoogr=
oups.com
                                Subject: Re: Character Debut/Retur=
n...

                                Terminion stares.

                  =
              Terminion: We're supposed to trust you?

                    =
            He looked at the other 4.

                                Mons=
ter: Grr.

                                Terminion: Okay. Let's go.

    =
                            They follow Skulletron. Who knows why? They jus=
t do...

                                ----- Original Message -----
     =
                           From: LurkerAbyss
                              =
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
                                Sent: Sunday, =
August 04, 2002 1:32 AM
                                Subject: Re: Charac=
ter Debut/Return...


                                Skulletron looked at =
the Five Felons, observed them carefully.  He spit at their feet.

        =
                        Skulletron:  I've seen too much.  You follow me.  O=
r else, I will devour you.  And I'm not kidding.  Don't speak until spoken =
to.  Don't try anything funny, unless you feel like dieing.

              =
                  The Slaughter(organic) half of him hissed, as slime dripp=
ed from his mouth  and body.  Skulletron then began walking forward.  He sl=
ipped a gun out from a special compartment, and aimed it at Terminion's hea=
d, and then dropped his arm and gun back down to his side, and continued wa=
lking...

                                -------Original Message-------

 =
                               From: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
               =
                 Date: August 04, 2002 01:28:04 AM
                        =
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
                                Subject:=
 Re: Character Debut/Return...

                                The Five Fe=
lons were just strolling up when this incredible act happened!

           =
                     Terminion: Hello.

                                He =
got ready to draw one of his weapons should he need to.

                  =
              Terminion: Hello friend.

                                Jun=
k Man wasn't used to being serious. Since the 5 character limit started, it=
 was tough to survive as a serious character, you just got ignored.

      =
                          Junk Man: Ask him what side he's on.

           =
                     Danny: No, stupid, what side are WE on?

             =
                   Mincer thought pleasant thoughts of Cardhead getting dec=
apitated and disemboweled...

                                ----- Origina=
l Message -----
                                From: LurkerAbyss
         =
                       To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
                         =
       Sent: Saturday, August 03, 2002 1:07 PM
                            =
    Subject: Character Debut/Return...


                                OO=
C:  Yesss, it's here, my first character in this "restart".  God, I hate th=
is damn restart.  NBWRPG used to be so perfect...

                        =
        BIC: 

                                A deserted stretch of land. =
 A sky, once a bright shade of blue, was now being replaced by a quick movi=
ng area of darkness.  Soon, rain started to fall and showered the ground.  =
Thunder boomed as lightning pierced the sky.  As time flew by, the storm ra=
ged on, getting more violent each minute.  The sky suddenly bloomed a dark =
purple.  A monsterous bolt of lightning struck the earth below.  The wet mu=
d that was once dirt spewed through the air, as a fist plunged up from the =
ground!  Another streak of lightning met with the fist.  There was an explo=
sion of sparks, and then the ground started to shake vigorously.  The fist =
started rising out of the ground, and revealed an arm.  The arm kept rising=
, and then another fist and arm popped out of the ground.  Soon, a head was=
 revealed.  The figure started forcing its way out of the ground.  The stor=
m had reached its peak of brutality, destroying ground and raging on madly.=
  Within a matter of long, never-ending minutes, the figure stood on two le=
gs now.  The storm stopped just then, so suddenly.  Everything seemed to st=
op at that moment.  The rain, everything, just disappeared.  The sky was bl=
ue, the sun was beaming, not a single cloud up there.  Calm as a sleeping b=
aby.  The figure that stood on the land was hideous.  It was almost two thi=
ngs merged into one.  One half was metallic, almost robotic.  The other hal=
f, was slimy, and organic, with a pincir for a hand.......

               =
                 ENTER SKULLETRON/SLAUGHTER...

                            =
    <DIV> </DIV>
                                <DIV>A deserted stret=
ch of land.  A sky, 
                                once a bright sha=
de of blue, was now being 
                                replaced by=
 a quick moving area of 
                                darkness.  So=
on, rain started to fall and 
                                showered the =
ground.  Thunder boomed as 
                                lightning =
pierced the sky.  As time flew 
                                by, th=
e storm raged on, getting more violent 
                                eac=
h minute.  The sky suddenly bloomed a 
                               =
 dark purple.  A monsterous bolt of 
                                l=
ightning struck the earth below.  The wet 
                           =
     mud that was once dirt spewed through the air, 
                      =
          as a fist plunged up from the ground!  
                    =
            Another streak of lightning met with the 
                     =
           fist.  There was an explosion of sparks, 
                 =
               and then the ground started to shake 
                      =
          vigorously.  The fist started rising 
                 =
               out of the ground, and revealed an arm.  
             =
                   The arm kept rising, and then another fist and 
        =
                        arm popped out of the ground.  Soon, a head 
 =
                               was revealed.  The figure started forci=
ng 
                                its way out of the ground.  The st=
orm had 
                                reached its peak of brutality, des=
troying ground 
                                and raging on madly.  =
Within a matter of 
                                long, never-ending minu=
tes, the figure stood on 
                                two legs now.&nbs=
p; The storm stopped just then, 
                                so suddenl=
y.  Everything seemed to stop at 
                                that=
 moment.  The rain, everything, just 
                                =
disappeared.  The sky was blue, the sun was 
                         =
       beaming, not a single cloud up there.  Calm 
                  =
              as a sleeping baby.  The figure that stood 
            =
                    on the land was hideous.  It was almost two 
     =
                           things merged into one.  One half was 
    =
                            metallic, almost robotic.  The 
          =
                      other half, was slimy, and organic, with a 
    =
                            pincir for a hand.......</DIV>
